name: Rejected by time
description:
The concept is about a Peruvian scientist, goes to the past after having crossed a portal from one of his experiments, but he is constantly propelled into the future as a consequence of not belonging to that time. Having no control of his body, with the help of his partner who are in contact from a smartphone, he evades various obstacles to survive until they can generate a portal to the present time.
